tool_description:
This API identifies criminal records that have been aggregated and made available for online access from state departments of corrections, county and state courts, sex offender registries and more. Records may be available on felonies, misdemeanors, traffic violations, sex offenses and incarcerations to help uncover information about criminal convictions that may otherwise be difficult to discover. Coverage varies by county and jurisdiction.
User credentialing is required for access.
title: Criminal Records Search

api_list.name: /GetReport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://criminal-records-search.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "criminal-records-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://criminal-records-search.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"
